comments.body: Seems this is only used in BrokerServer, should we move the trait there, or do we intend to use these states in the other server classes as well?

> Seems [`sealed trait ProcessStatus`] is only used in BrokerServer, should we move the trait there, or do we intend to use these states in the other server classes as well

We'll use it in `ControllerServer` as well, so I think we should keep it here.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +100,104 @@  case object STARTING extends ProcessStatus
  case object STARTED extends ProcessStatus
  case object SHUTTING_DOWN extends ProcessStatus

  val SUPPORTED_FEATURES = Collections.
